text: Diceware is a method of creating passwords and cryptographic letters using ordinary dice as a random number generator. ==Examples== Here are some examples created from diceware: * dobbs bella bump flash begin ansi * easel venom aver flung jon call * conjoined sterling securely chitchat spinout pelvis * rice immorally worrisome shopping traverse recharger ==References== Category:Cryptography Category:Computer security
title: Diceware
